titles.title: You Are The Words And The Music

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are the words and the music. You are the song that I sing. You are the melody. You are the harmony. Praises to Your name I will sing.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are the Mighty God. You are the Prince of Peace. You are the King of Kings. Now I give to You the song that You gave to me. You are the song that I sing.{/lang-eng}
